There is actually a little trick that works ONLY against {{champion:28}}  with the {{item:2043}} . If you put a {{item:2043}}  against a wall then put a {{item:2044}}  on the other side, it basically expands the true vision on the{{item:2043}}  allowing you to see {{champion:28}}. For example if you put a {{item:2043}}  in the dragon pit then have a {{item:2044}} in the tri-bush, she will be exposed with her not knowing it. Same goes with the {{item:2043}} in the baron pit and {{item:2044}} in the top tri-bush, or if you are on red side bot lane/blue side top lane, then simply put a {{item:2044}} in the river bush then a {{item:2043}}  on the other side of the wall. If you are in mid lane, put a {{item:2044}} against the wall in the one of the side bushes then a put a {{item:2043}}  on your side of the wall.

*****NOTE: Be sure to place the all the wards close against walls, warding in mid lane side bushes only covers 3/4 of the bush in true vision, and same thing for tri-bushes, other areas are fine.
